717674f-b.text:
Broadway, north from W. 81st Street as photographed from a point to the south of same. To the right, at the S.E. corner of 81st Street is Eeiths' 81st Street Theatre. Note on the same side the new apartment house under construction at the N.E. corner of 82nd Street. The Forres (No. 2261-71) and the Saxony (No. 227E-79) are at the left, occupying the west side frontage of Broadway from 81st to 82nd Streets. These photos appeared in the publication 'Silver Jubilee of Greater New York.
191S
Views 1 and 2
